TopicTitle: How to change this on Vector engine?

Articles.Content:
the shroud on my vector engine for my second stage is 1.25 size but i want it 2.5 size, so its more aerodynamic and it looks better. is there any way i could change this? 

https://imgur.com/a/2KJAQwJ

Put one engine plate betwen the engine and the upper fuel tank

Like this: https://imgur.com/9geobFr

After that you dont need a decoupler, cause the engine plate work as a decoupler too.

Edited July 1, 2021 by Marlus
